alert.note: Alert for Crosby; Dickens; King (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 9:28AM CDT until June 08 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dickens County in northwestern Texas... King County in northwestern Texas... Central Crosby County in northwestern Texas... * Until 1000 AM CDT. * At 927 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Ralls to 13 miles west of Benjamin, moving south at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Crosbyton, Spur, Dickens, Guthrie, White River Lake, Ralls, Kalgary, Caprock, Finney, Afton and Mcadoo. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
